name: Mark and Move
overview: Objectives may only be scored once per player. After being scored, they are marked and cannot be claimed again by that warband.
primary_objectives: Each Primary Objective may be scored once per player. If you control an unscored Primary Objective at the end of your turn, score 2 Victory Points and mark it as scored for your warband.
secondary_objectives: Secondary Objectives follow the same rule. Each may be scored once per player, for 1 Victory Point.
special_rules: Use a token or marker to indicate that a player has scored a given objective. Both players may still contest the objective afterward, but cannot score it again.
